passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > header:nth-child(2) > div > nav:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > header:nth-child(2) > div > nav:nth-child(3) > h2:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(1) > div > header:nth-child(1) > h3
html > body > main:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(1) > div > ul:nth-child(2) > li:nth-child(1) > h4:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(1) > div > ul:nth-child(2) > li:nth-child(2) > h4:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(1) > div > ul:nth-child(2) > li:nth-child(3) > h4:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > header > h2:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(2) > section:nth-child(2) > div > header:nth-child(1) > h3
html > body > main:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(2) > section:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > ol > li > article > div > div > h4:nth-child(2)
